data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, all damage done by attacks to Skarmory during your opponent's next turn is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Its sturdy wings look heavy, but they are actually hollow and light, allowing it to fly freely in the sky.

attacks.name: Pick On
attacks.text: If the number of cards in your opponent's hand is at least 6, look at his or her hand. Choose a number of cards there until your opponent has 5 cards left in his or her hand and have your opponent shuffle the cards you chose into his or her deck.

attacks.name: Power Count
attacks.text: Count the amount of Energy attached to all of your Pokémon and all of your opponent's Pokémon. If your Pokémon have less Energy than your opponent's, this attack does 20 damage plus 30 more damage.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Steel Coat
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, during your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Skarmory.

data.flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

abilities.name: Metallic Lift
abilities.text: If Skarmory has any Metal Energy attached to it, the Retreat Cost for Skarmory is 0.

attacks.name: Spearhead
attacks.text: Draw a card.

attacks.name: Heavy Metal
attacks.text: Flip a coin for each Metal Energy attached to Skarmory. This attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage for each heads.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Steel Coat
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Metal Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokémon. Shuffle your deck afterward.

data.flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

attacks.name: Steel Beak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Air Cutter
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

abilities.name: Shining Horn
abilities.text: As long as Skarmory is the only Pokémon you have in play, your opponent's Basic Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Cry for Help
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Metal Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex), show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Skarmory by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Quick Attack
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Mach Blade
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 50 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Air Crash
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to the Defending Pokémon.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to Skarmory by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speeds over 180 mph.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Iron Wing
attacks.text: Discard a Metal Energy attached to this Pokémon.

data.flavorText: After nesting in bramble bushes, the wings of its chicks grow hard from scratches by thorns.

attacks.name: Steel Beak
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Air Cutter
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Blow Through
attacks.text: If there is any Stadium card in play, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speed of over 180 mph.

data.name: Skarmory-EX
rules: Pokémon-EX rule: When a Pokémon-EX has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

attacks.name: Joust
attacks.text: Before doing damage, discard all Pokémon Tool cards attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Tailspin Piledriver
attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Silver Feather
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, when your opponent puts a Basic Pokémon from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Metal Max
attacks.text: Discard all Metal Energy attached to Skarmory FB. Flip a coin for each Energy card you discarded. This attack does 20 damage plus 40 damage for each heads.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Metallic Sound
attacks.text: Discard all Special Energy from each Pokémon.

attacks.name: Aerial Ace
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its feathers, which fall off as it grows, are thin and sharp. In times long past, warriors used them as swords.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Cargo Jet
attacks.text: Discard a Team Plasma card from your hand. if you do, draw 3 cards.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, any damage done to this Pokémon by attacks is reduced by 20 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Its heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Claw
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

data.flavorText: Despite being clad entirely in iron-hard armor, it flies at speed of over 180 mph.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Metal Sound
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Swift
attacks.text: This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, or any other effects on the Defending Pokémon.

data.flavorText: Its heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Calm Strike
attacks.text: If you have used your GX attack, this attack does 70 more damage.

attacks.name: Steel Wing
attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.flavorText: Its metal body is sturdy, but it does rust rather easily. So on rainy days, this Pokémon prefers to stay put in its nest.

data.name: Skarmory ex
rules: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.

abilities.name: Metal Gravity
abilities.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon retreats and has 40 or more remaining HP, put 3 damage counters on that Pokémon. You can't use more than 1 Metal Gravity Poké-Body each turn.

attacks.name: Whirlwind
attacks.text: Your opponent switches the Defending Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Metal Arms
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has a Pokémon Tool attached, this attack does 40 more damage.

data.flavorText: Its body is draped in steel armor. It looks heavy, but it can fly at speeds of up to 185 miles an hour!

attacks.name: Double Peck
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Spinning Head
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, switch Skarmory with 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.text: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 40 more damage.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Slashing Steel
attacks.text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can't use Slashing Steel.

data.flavorText: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Big Storm
attacks.text: Discard a Stadium in play.

data.flavorText: People fashion swords from Skarmory's shed feathers, so this Pokémon is a popular element in heraldic designs.

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.text: During your opponent's next turn, this Pokémon takes 30 less damage from attacks (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

data.name: Skarmory

attacks.name: Roost
attacks.text: Heal 50 damage from this Pokémon. During your next turn, this Pokémon can't retreat.

data.flavorText: Its sturdy, heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.

data.name: Steven's Skarmory

attacks.name: Sonic Double
attacks.text: This attack does 50 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

data.flavorText: Its sturdy, heavy-looking iron body is actually thin and light, so it can fly at speeds over 180 mph.
